alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 4:24AM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Escambia, Covington, Okaloosa and southeastern Santa Rosa Counties through 500 AM CST... At 324 AM CST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of McKenzie to Navarre Beach. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wright, Fort Walton Beach, Crestview, Niceville, Andalusia, Opp, Valparaiso, Mary Esther, Florala, Ocean City, Baker, Navarre, River Falls, Red Level, Laurel Hill, Lockhart, Cinco Bayou, Heath and Gantt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for south central Alabama...and northwestern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
